tool.name: SBOL Converter: GENBANK TO SBOL3

param.label: Namespace URL
param.help: Namespace URL, required for conversions from GenBank. Default=https://synbiohub.org/public/igem

tool.help:
SBOL Converter: GENBANK to SBOL3 ================================
Convert GENBANK file to SBOL3.
Input ----- Required:
* **INPUT_FILE**\ : GENBANK input file in GB format. * **Namespace URL**\ : Namespace URL, required for conversions from GenBank. Default=https://synbiohub.org/public/igem"
Output ------ * **OUTPUT_FILE**\ : SBOL3 output file in NT format.
Project Links ------------------ * `GitHub <https://github.com/SynBioDex/SBOL-utilities>`_
License ------- * `MIT <https://github.com/SynBioDex/SBOL-utilities/blob/develop/LICENSE.txt>`_
